name: Chantodo's Force
flavorText: Only a master of the mystical arts can harness the forces contained within this orb.
flavorTextHtml: Only a master of the mystical arts can harness the forces contained within this orb.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%
Critical Hits grant [3 - 4] Arcane Power

setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Every second while in Archon form you expel a Wave of Destruction, dealing 4000% weapon damage to enemies within 30 yards. This damage scales with attack speed.    
 Every time you hit with an attack while not in Archon form, 4000% weapon damage is added to the Wave of Destruction, stacking up to 20 times.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Every second while in Archon form you expel a Wave of Destruction, dealing 4000% weapon damage to enemies within 30 yards. This damage scales with attack speed.
Every time you hit with an attack while not in Archon form, 4000% weapon damage is added to the Wave of Destruction, stacking up to 20 times.
